item.description:
Let's relieve some stress, have fun, chug down a few beers and knock those pins down! Ten pin bowling.

What is X-treme bowling? We play while lights are dimmed. The pins glow in flourescent colors. Wild bowling challenges. Prizes will be given for high score, low score, most gutter balls, and most strikes.

We will form teams of 4-6 people per lane. We'll have 4 lanes.
$5.00 per game per person.

Rent shoes for $4.50 or bring your own bowling shoes. Use their bowling balls or bring your own.

Arrive at 8:15 to get shoes and select your ball. Bowling starts at 9 pm.

If you don't want to bowl, come to watch and cheer others on.
No charge to watch! Food and drinks available there.

Driving directions from Hartford:
I 84 E to exit 58 (Roberts St.) toward Silver Lane/Burnside Ave.;
Take ramp toward Silver Lane/Main St./Manchester;
Turn slight RIGHT onto Roberts St;
Turn LEFT onto Silver Lane;
1/2 mile up road on LEFT is SILVER LANES bowling alley.
